name: v6.111.0
body:
>[!IMPORTANT]
> `dd-trace-py` version is [v3.9.3](https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-py/releases/tag/v3.9.3)

## What's Changed
* fix: http.url tag to include protocol (#603) 
@duncanista

* update codeowners file and make apm serverless co-owners of repo (#596)
@happynancee

* chore: Use GitHub App for update-deps workflow (#605)
@lym953

* feat: Enable sqs -> lambda support for DSM (#604) 
@michael-zhao459
@purple4reina

* Consolidate env reading to single config object. (#600)
@purple4reina

* fix: handle a case where the record is some customized item (#616)
@joeyzhao2018


**Full Changelog**: 
- datadog-lambda-python https://github.com/DataDog/datadog-lambda-python/compare/v6.110.0...v6.111.0
- ddtrace https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-py/compare/v3.7.2...v3.9.3
